verses.verse: And I saw <S%G3708><s%> another <S%G243><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> and marvelous, <S%G2298><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> who had <S%G2192><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> plagues, <S%G4127><s%> [which are] the last, <S%G2078><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> in them the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is finished. <S%G5055><s%>

And I saw, <S%G3708><s%> as it were, a sea <S%G2281><s%> of glass <S%G5193><s%> mixed <S%G3396><s%> with fire, <S%G4442><s%> and those <S%G3588><s%> who had come <S%G3528><s%> off <S%G3528><s%> victorious <S%G3528><s%> from the beast <S%G2342><s%> and from his image <S%G1504><s%> and from the number <S%G706><s%> of his name, <S%G3686><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> on the sea <S%G2281><s%> of glass, <S%G5193><s%> holding <S%G2192><s%> harps <S%G2788><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And they sang <S%G103><s%> the song <S%G5603><s%> of Moses <S%G3475><s%> the bond-servant of God <S%G2316><s%> and the song <S%G5603><s%> of the Lamb, <S%G721><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Great <S%G3173><s%> and marvelous <S%G2298><s%> are Thy works, <S%G2041><s%> O Lord <S%G2962><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the Almighty; <S%G3841><s%> Righteous <S%G1342><s%> and true <S%G228><s%> are Thy ways, <S%G3598><s%> Thou King <S%G935><s%> of the nations. <S%G1484><s%>

"Who <S%G5101><s%> will not fear, <S%G5399><s%> O Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and glorify <S%G1392><s%> Thy name <S%G3686><s%>? For Thou alone <S%G3441><s%> art holy; <S%G3741><s%> For all <S%G3956><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%> will come <S%G2240><s%> and worship <S%G4352><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> Thee, For Thy righteous <S%G1345><s%> acts <S%G1345><s%> have been revealed. <S%G5319><s%>"

After <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> I looked, <S%G3708><s%> and the temple <S%G3485><s%> of the tabernacle <S%G4633><s%> of testimony <S%G3142><s%> in heaven <S%G3772><s%> was opened, <S%G455><s%>

and the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> who had <S%G2192><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> plagues <S%G4127><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out of the temple, <S%G3485><s%> clothed <S%G1746><s%> in linen, <S%G3043><s%> clean <S%G2513><s%> [and] bright, <S%G2986><s%> and girded <S%G4024><s%> around <S%G4012><s%> their breasts <S%G4738><s%> with golden <S%G5552><s%> girdles. <S%G2223><s%>

And one <S%G1520><s%> of the four <S%G5064><s%> living <S%G2226><s%> creatures <S%G2226><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> to the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> golden <S%G5552><s%> bowls <S%G5357><s%> full <S%G1073><s%> of the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> who lives <S%G2198><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%>

And the temple <S%G3485><s%> was filled <S%G1072><s%> with smoke <S%G2586><s%> from the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and from His power; <S%G1411><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> was able <S%G1410><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> plagues <S%G4127><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> were finished. <S%G5055><s%>
